txt.en: The mother lynx has been defeated
Thrasi has given you some thistle-mead to feed to the mother lynx, hopefully to help heal her injuries.
'All right, here you go. Try feeding some of this thistle-mead to the mother lynx. No sneaking sips for yourself, mind you!'
The mother lynx is at Thrasi's cabin.\n\nThrasi asked you to feed the thistle-mead to the mother lynx.

'See? Thistle-mead! Good for what ails you... if you're a cat, that is!

'Hmm. She seems to like me... doesn't want to run off anyway. I could use a hunting partner, and her cub's taken a shine to me as well.

'Thanks for all your help, friend. In a few years, this cub'll be old enough to join me on hunts with his mother. Hendrevail beware!'
Thrasi is at the hunter's lodge to the north.\n\nThe mother lynx seems to be completely healed, yet she has returned to Thrasi's side.
'That mead should fix her up right!'
The mother lynx sniffs tentatively at the fragrant mead, then quickly laps it all up.
'Come back in a few years, and we'll all go hunting with my new friends here.'
'Next time I look for a cat, I'll remember not to look in the wild!'
Thrasi strokes the fur of the lynx cub. 'See to it that its mother can walk on its own. A short jaunt around the trees should do it.'
Feed the thistle-mead to the mother lynx
